quotes.content: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.content: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.content: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success.
quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer

quotes.content: To be yourself in a world that is constantly trying to make you something else is the greatest accomplishment.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.content: In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: It goes on.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.content: Life isn't about waiting for the storm to pass, it's about learning to dance in the rain.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.content: You miss 100% of the shots you don't take.
quotes.author: Wayne Gretzky

quotes.content: I am not a product of my circumstances. I am a product of my decisions.
quotes.author: Stephen R. Covey

quotes.content: The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.content: To live is the rarest thing in the world. Most people exist, that is all.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde
